_header: The holy bishop Remegius in France was I-bore
Subjects: Remigius, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Remigius, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Þe holy bysschop remygye in france was I borea good whyle er
                    he were be ȝete to crist he was I core…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& bring vs to oure eritage þat to vs alle is
                    dyȝte& þer to wonye wit him þat is oure alþer
                    dryȝte
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 394-8.
